# sakura_iam_project (Data Source)

Get information about an existing IAM Project.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_iam_project" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `code` (String) The code of the IAM Project
- `id` (String) The ID of the IAM Project.
- `name` (String) The name of the IAM Project.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp of the IAM Project
- `description` (String) The description of the IAM Project.
- `parent_folder_id` (String) The parent folder ID associated with the IAM Project
- `status` (String) The status of the IAM Project
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp of the IAM Project
